description:
Nono, a young girl from the country, moves to the big city in order to achieve her dream: becoming a space pilot! However, in order to do that, she`ll not only have to reach for the top, she`ll have to go Topless--and her chance comes a lot sooner than expected!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Please, Let Me Call You Onee-sama!
お姉さまと呼ばせて下さい!
